name: Combat Sense
shortContent:
The character may use his Perception Bonus in
place of his Agility Bonus when rolling Initiative.
content:
The character has the ability to consciously recognise the
proddings of his subconscious as it reacts to his preternaturally
sharp senses, giving the character an edge that mere speed
cannot match. The character may use his Perception Bonus in
place of his Agility Bonus when rolling Initiative.
